item.title: 508 Crafting [RESOLVED]
item.dc:creator: @mrcrispypwn mrcrispypwn
item.description:
@mrcrispypwn wrote:

I wrote up this code to make an emerald amulet and

if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1605 || itemUsed == 1605 && usedWith == 1755) { // emerald ammy
if (player.skillLvl[12] >= 31) {
pi.deleteItem(player, 1605, 1);
pi.addItem(player, 1677, 1);
player.addSkillXP(120 ,12);
if (player.skillLvl[12] <= 31) {
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You need a crafting level of 31 to make an Emerald Amulet.");
}

And I got this in my compiler:

Compiling FreshScape 508 Packets...
.\palidino76\rs2\io\packets\ItemOnItem.java:1139: reached end of file while pars
ing
}→
 ^
1 error
Complete.
Press any key to continue . . .

Can someone tell me exactly what that means?
I resolved on my own and an idea from the guy who posted first and said something about a misplaced bracket
it was supposed to go like this:

if (itemUsed == 1755 && usedWith == 1605 || itemUsed == 1605 && usedWith == 1755) { // emerald ammy
if (player.skillLvl[12] >= 31) ;
pi.deleteItem(player, 1605, 1);
pi.addItem(player, 1677, 1);
player.addSkillXP(120 ,12);
if (player.skillLvl[12] <= 31) ;
player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You need a crafting level of 31 to make an Emerald Amulet.");
}

Read full topic
